objects.name: Test physical access
objects.description: An  adversary can test physical access options in preparation for the actual attack. This could range from observing behaviors and noting security precautions to actually attempting access. (Citation: OCIAC Pre Incident Indicators) (Citation: NewsAgencySpy)

external_references.description: Orange County Intelligence Assessment Center. (n.d.). Pre-Incident Indicators. Retrieved March 28, 2017.
The Canadian Press. (2012, August 22). Reporter says Chinese news agency asked him to spy. Retrieved March 9, 2017.
